recipe_name: Walnut, pear and goats' cheese salad
author: Garrey Dawson
method: For the salad, place the pear pieces, walnuts, cheese and herbs into a large bowl and mix well. For the dressing, place the oil, vinegar and lemon juice into a bowl. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix well. To serve, pour the dressing over the salad and stir well to coat the salad ingredients. Place the salad onto a serving plate.
